SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! CONNECTION DETAILS LOGGING ! PMREP Path : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "PMREP path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_PMREP_DIR#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Repository service : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Repository name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_REPOSITORY#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Domain : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Domain name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_DOMAIN#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Host name : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Host name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_HOSTNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Port : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port number" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_PORTNUMBER#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Username : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Security domain : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Security domain" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_SECURITYDOMAIN#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Password environment variable : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Password environment variable" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_PSWD_ENV_VAR#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Connect without user : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Connect without user" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_KERBEROS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Environment Variables File : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Environment variables file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_ENV_FILE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM

DOCU_Docu.DOC: Common AE script to log Connection details parameters.
